title: Introduction to FinnaR
text: vignette provides overview use FinnaR package…
code: library(FinnaR) record <- search_finna("sibelius") print(record) ## # A tibble: 100 × 8 ##    Title                   Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series ##    <chr>                   <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  ##  1 Sibelius favourites : … Sibel… 2001  NA       Äänite… orkeste… Lapin … NA     ##  2 SIBELIUS                TAWAS… 1997  fin      Kirja,… SIBELIUS Anders… NA     ##  3 Sibelius                Tawas… 1997  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Anders… NA     ##  4 Sibelius                Lampi… 1984  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Helka-… NA     ##  5 Sibelius                Tawas… 2003  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… NA     ##  6 Sibelius                Ringb… 1948  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kirkes… NA     ##  7 Sibelius                Downe… 1945  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… OUTI-k… NA     ##  8 Sibelius                Tawas… 1968  swe      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Helle-… NA     ##  9 Sibelius                Ringb… NA    swe      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Taidey… NA     ## 10 Sibelius                Layto… 1984  eng      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Jyväsk… The m… ## # ℹ 90 more rows

10 Bicycle USA           League … 1984  eng      Opinnä… Cycling… Jyväsk… NA     ## # ℹ 90 more rows library(FinnaR) phrase <- search_finna("farm OR farming") print(phrase) ## # A tibble: 100 × 8 ##    Title                   Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series ##  3 Farm machinery          Bell,… 1985  eng      Kirja,… maatalo… Helka-… Farmi… ##  4 Farm workshop           Bell,… 1981  eng      Kirja,… worksho… Helka-… Farmi… ##  5 Corporate farming and … Great… 1970  eng      Kirja,… Farm co… Varast… NA     ##  6 Farm machinery          Bell,… 1996  eng      Kirja,… NA       Varast… NA     ##  7 Farm machinery          Bell,… 1989  eng      Kirja,… koneet.… Helka-… NA     ##  8 Farm business manageme… Nutha… 2011  eng      Kirja,… maatila… Seinäj… NA     ##  9 Farm computer news      NA     1981  eng      Lehti/… NA       Varast… NA     ## 10 Dairy farm business ma… Slate… 1983  eng      Kirja,… Dairy f… Helka-… NA     ## # ℹ 90 more rows

title: Introduction to FinnaR
text: Example 2
code: library(FinnaR) Combination <- search_finna("nutrition AND (diet OR lifestyle)") print(Combination) ## # A tibble: 100 × 8 ##    Title                   Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series ##    <chr>                   <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  ##  1 Lifestyle nutrition     Dwyer… 2001  eng      Kirja,… Health … Helka-… Lifes… ##  2 Diet and nutrition      Evans… 1984  eng      Kirja,… NA       Varast… NA     ##  3 Nutrition and lifestyl… Maail… 1999  eng      Kirja,… Nutriti… Helka-… NA     ##  4 Diet, nutrition, and c… Assem… 1982  eng      Kirja,… Cancer,… Jyväsk… NA     ##  5 Nutrition and diet the… Willi… 1985  eng      Kirja,… NA       Varast… NA     ##  6 Foods, diet, and nutri… Jones… 1970  eng      Kirja,… NA       Varast… NA     ##  7 Nutrition and diet the… Willi… 1977  eng      Kirja,… ravitse… Varast… NA     ##  8 Nutrition and diet the… Lutz,… 2015  eng      Kirja,… Diet Th… 3AMK-k… NA     ##  9 Nutrition, Diet and Ca… Shank… 2012  eng      Kirja,… Medicin… Jyväsk… NA     ## 10 Nutrition and diet the… Willi… 1973  eng      Kirja,… NA       Varast… NA     ## # ℹ 90 more rows library(FinnaR) Combination_AND <- search_finna("Karisto AND Seppälä") print(Combination_AND) ## # A tibble: 100 × 8 ##    Title                   Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series ##    <chr>                   <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  ##  1 Junan viemä : muusikko… Karis… 2015  fin      Lehti/… muusiko… Kansal… Missä… ##  2 Maukas gradu : valmist… Karis… 2004  fin      Kirja,… tutkiel… Humani… NA     ##  3 Tee se! : sosiaalipoli… Karis… 2000  fin      Kirja,… kirjoit… Helka-… Työra… ##  4 [Kirja-arvostelu]       Karis… 2000  fin      Lehti/… Lehtola… Kansal… NA     ##  5 Lahden, Kariston ja va… Hiila… 2016  fin      Kirja,… Karisto… Itä-Su… NA     ##  6 Maukas gradu : valmist… Karis… 2004  fin      Kirja,… researc… 3AMK-k… NA     ##  7 [Kirja-arvostelu:Mauka… Kuusi… 2004  fin      Lehti/… Karisto… Kansal… NA     ##  8 Topi karkuteillä        Seppä… 2011  fin      Kirja,… Topi,, … Anders… Koira… ##  9 [Kirja-arvostelu:Mauka… Ahpon… 2004  fin      Lehti/… Karisto… Kansal… NA     ## 10 Topi löytöretkillä      Seppä… 2009  fin      Kirja,… Siru,, … Anders… Koira… ## # ℹ 90 more rows

title: R package for Finna API (One Line, Title Case)
text: devel version FinnnaR can installed GitHub follows:
code: # Install FinnaR if not already installed if (!requireNamespace("FinnaR", quietly = TRUE)) {   remotes::install_github("ake123/FinnaR") } remotes::install_github("ake123/FinnaR")

title: R package for Finna API (One Line, Title Case)
text: basic functionality FinnaR can explored follows:
code: # Load the package library(FinnaR) # Perform a simple search and print a table  record <- search_finna("sibelius") knitr::kable(head(record))

title: R package for Finna API (One Line, Title Case)
text: Please note FinnaR project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms. Contributions welcome form feedback, issues pull requests. can find contributor guidelines FinnaR .

title: R package for Finna API (One Line, Title Case)
text: Please note FinnaR made possible thanks many R rOpenGov software authors, cited vignettes describing package. package developed using following resources: usethis generate initial template. Continuous code testing performed GitHub actions include R CMD check, Code coverage assessment possible thanks codecov. documentation website automatically updated thanks pkgdown. documentation formatted thanks devtools roxygen2.

title: R package for Finna API (One Line, Title Case)
text: package way officially related endorsed Finna. using data retrieved Finna database work, please indicate data source Finna. re-use involves kind modification data text, please state clearly end user. See Finna policy copyright free re-use data detailed information certain exceptions.

title: Check access to https://api.finna.fi/api/v1/?openapi — check_api_access

what: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
text: function retrieves multiple Finna records based vector record IDs. can specify fields return, language, pagination options.

title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
code: get_finna_records(   ids,   field = NULL,   prettyPrint = FALSE,   lng = "fi",   page = 1,   limit = 100 )

title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
text: ids vector record IDs retrieve. field vector fields return. Defaults NULL, returns default fields. prettyPrint Logical; whether pretty-print response. Defaults FALSE. lng Language returned translated strings. Defaults "fi". page page number retrieve. Defaults 1. limit number records return per page. Defaults 20.

title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
text: list containing retrieved records data.

title: Get Finna Records by IDs with Extended Options — get_finna_records
code: records <- get_finna_records("fikka.3405646", field = "title", prettyPrint = TRUE, lng = "en-gb") print(records) #> # A tibble: 1 × 8 #>   Title               Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series #>   <chr>               <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  #> 1 Uimaveden puhdistus NA     NA    NA       NA      NA       NA      NA

what: Search Finna Index with Extended Options — search_finna
title: Search Finna Index with Extended Options — search_finna
text: Search Finna Index Extended Options

title: Search Finna Index with Extended Options — search_finna
code: search_finna(   lookfor,   type = "AllFields",   fields = NULL,   filters = NULL,   facets = NULL,   facetFilters = NULL,   sort = "relevance,id asc",   page = 1,   limit = 100,   lng = "fi",   prettyPrint = FALSE )

title: Search Finna Index with Extended Options — search_finna
text: lookfor Search terms. May include boolean operators. type Search type (e.g., "AllFields", "Title", "Author", "Subject"). Defaults "AllFields". fields vector fields return. Defaults NULL, returns default fields. filters vector filter queries. Defaults NULL. facets vector facets queries. Defaults NULL. facetFilters vector facetFilters queries. Defaults NULL sort Sort method. Defaults "relevance,id asc". page page number retrieve. Defaults 1. limit number records return per page. Defaults 20. lng Language returned translated strings. Defaults "fi". prettyPrint Logical; whether pretty-print response. Defaults FALSE.

title: Search Finna Index with Extended Options — search_finna
text: list containing search results.

title: Search Finna Index with Extended Options — search_finna
code: search_results <- search_finna("sibelius") print(search_results) #> # A tibble: 100 × 8 #>    Title                   Author Year  Language Formats Subjects Library Series #>    <chr>                   <chr>  <chr> <chr>    <chr>   <chr>    <chr>   <chr>  #>  1 Sibelius favourites : … Sibel… 2001  NA       Äänite… orkeste… Lapin … NA     #>  2 SIBELIUS                TAWAS… 1997  fin      Kirja,… SIBELIUS Anders… NA     #>  3 Sibelius                Tawas… 1997  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Anders… NA     #>  4 Sibelius                Lampi… 1984  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Helka-… NA     #>  5 Sibelius                Tawas… 2003  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kansal… NA     #>  6 Sibelius                Ringb… 1948  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Kirkes… NA     #>  7 Sibelius                Downe… 1945  fin      Kirja,… Sibeliu… OUTI-k… NA     #>  8 Sibelius                Tawas… 1968  swe      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Helle-… NA     #>  9 Sibelius                Ringb… NA    swe      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Taidey… NA     #> 10 Sibelius                Layto… 1984  eng      Kirja,… Sibeliu… Jyväsk… The m… #> # ℹ 90 more rows
